Object.Perch.Name: Parrot Perch
Object.Perch.Description: A small stand where your feathery friend can sit
Mail.Emily.Perch_Recipe: Hey @^Have you heard? I recently adopted a parrot!^Clint even made me a little perch for him to sit on, isn't that sweet of him?^Anyway, he gave me the plans to build one in case I adopted any more but I don't really think I'll need them, so I figured you might want them! Talk soon!   ^   -Emily
